channel.title: Ronald Shusett on jverkamp.com
channel.description: Recent content in Ronald Shusett on jverkamp.com

item.title: Total Recall
item.description: Despite coming out only a few years after I was born, I only managed to actually see the original Total Recall film in the last few months. So I didn’t have nearly the nostalgic baggage that a lot of people had coming into it.

item.title: Prometheus
item.description: Huh. Well, the trailers were good. That’s something at least.
